item.title: Wristcheck Privacy Policy
item.description: WristCheck Privacy Policy v1.0.0 # Grant Hutchison built the WristCheck app as an Ad Supported app. This SERVICE is provided by Grant Hutchison at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.

item.title: Wristcheck App
item.description: WristCheck App # Version 1.0.0 is live! # I’m pleased to announce that I’ve just released my first fully released app on both Android and iOS! (If you’re browsing around you may see I have previously posted about the ReboundMTB app, however this was never fully released!). What is WristCheck? # WristCheck is a digital watch box, so if you’re both a) a watch collector, and b) a nerd, then this post might interest you!
